Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Prohibits certain confidentiality and nondisclosure provisions from inclusion in contracts entered into by the state
Summary: Prohibits certain confidentiality and nondisclosure provisions from inclusion in contracts entered into by the state; provides an exclusion in cases of sexual harassment when the complainant prefers confidentiality.
LawCode: Add ยง89-a, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting certain confidentiality and nondisclosure provisions from inclusion in contracts entered into by the state
